data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack for The Amazing Bernard! 50 songs and over an hour of epic, original music from George and Joseph Kitchen!
Songs (.mp3's) will be placed in your The Amazing Bernard folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\The Amazing Bernard\Soundtrack
